function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Elderly and vulnerable populations stressed by increasing heat","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to heat-related illnesses and discomfort","Mitigation":"Provide access to cooling facilities or shade, and promote green infrastructure","Technologies":"Cooling systems, green roofs, trees, and shade structures","People":"Elderly, very old individuals, people with previous illnesses, children, socially disadvantaged groups","Owner":"Local municipalities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited access to cooling facilities for vulnerable populations","Impact":"Higher risk of heat-related illnesses and discomfort","Mitigation":"Provide free or affordable access to air conditioners or cooling centers","Technologies":"Air conditioners, cooling centers","People":"Elderly, very old individuals, people with previous illnesses, socially disadvantaged groups","Owner":"Public health organizations, local government"},{"Description":"High energy consumption and climate change implications of widespread air conditioner use","Impact":"Increased greenhouse gas emissions and energy costs","Mitigation":"Promote green infrastructure and sustainable cooling solutions","Technologies":"Green roofs, trees, energy-efficient cooling systems","People":"General population, environmentally conscious individuals","Owner":"Local municipalities, environmental organizations"}]}
